name: Haunted Island
description:
Haunted Island is a game made by solo game developer for Miz Jam 1.

Take role of legendary exterminator and clean island from aggressive bats and ghosts.

Explore the haunted island and discover it's secrets while trying to survive and get rid of bats and ghosts.

Controls:

W, A, S, D - Move

LMB - Fire

RBM - Drop Bomb

Tab - Open To do list

R - Reload
